title: VCR/VHS FONT (old tv menu)
content:
\*The font is NOT vcr osd mono. The font I am looking for has a smooth less "pixely" border than vcr osd mono.  
\*If this helps, some people say the font is "TLOZ Phantom Hourglass" but it isn't even similar to the font in the picture.  
\*Here is a link to the picture : [https://m.flickr.com/#/photos/130673079@N06/16600420652/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414221240/https:/m.flickr.com/#/photos/130673079@N06/16600420652/ "https://m.flickr.com/#/photos/130673079@N06/16600420652/")
author: jennamayhems
